page.description: Convert a date in YYYYMMDD format to {MM/DD/YYYY}

argument.name: cDate
argument.description: A character representation of a date in the format YYYYMMDD.

page.discussion: The STOD() function converts a character representation of a date into a date value. STOD() generates an error if the input is invalid.

ref.href: /Api/Functions/Data Type/Date and Time Functions/Date and Time Functions.html
